price: Paanong ukol sa kanila ang paalaala gayong may dumating ng sa kanilang isang Sugong malinaw [na si Propeta Muḥammad]?
arabic: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ وَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: annā lahumu al-dhik'rā waqad jāahum rasūlun mubīnun
